### Name {#a5af8e0807e55ac77fb4f4b3d3c633e9e}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="const std::string llvm::sandboxir::Pass::Name"
  labels = {["protected"]}>
The pass name.

This is also used as a command-line flag and should not contain whitespaces.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/sandboxir/pass-h/#l00050">50</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/sandboxir/pass-h">Pass.h</a>.
